name: azellaz.com
description: Dev space for Azellaz.com. She's crafty, and she's just my type!

scripts.css:dev: postcss -u postcss-custom-properties postcss-color-function postcss-import autoprefixer cssnano -d css/dist/ css/src/az.css --no-map --watch
scripts.css:build: postcss -u postcss-custom-properties postcss-color-function postcss-import autoprefixer cssnano -d css/dist/ css/src/az.css --no-map
scripts.start: npm run refreshProductPages && npm run css:dev & bundle exec jekyll serve
scripts.build: npm run refreshProductPages && npm run css:build && jekyll build && npm run lambda

author: bzelip
